member.name: THREADENTRY32
member.summary: Describes an entry from a list of the threads executing in the system when a snapshot was taken.

member.name: THREADENTRY32.dwSize
member.summary: The size of the structure, in bytes. Before calling the function, set this member to sizeof(THREADENTRY32). If you do not initialize dwSize,Thread32First fails.

member.name: THREADENTRY32.cntUsage
member.summary: This member is no longer used and is always set to zero.

member.name: THREADENTRY32.th32ThreadID
member.summary: The thread identifier, compatible with the thread identifier returned by the function.

member.name: THREADENTRY32.th32OwnerProcessID
member.summary: The identifier of the process that created the thread.

member.name: THREADENTRY32.tpBasePri
member.summary: The kernel base priority level assigned to the thread. The priority is a number from 0 to 31, with 0 representing the lowest possible thread priority. For more information, see KeQueryPriorityThread.

member.name: THREADENTRY32.tpDeltaPri
member.summary: This member is no longer used and is always set to zero.

member.name: THREADENTRY32.dwFlags
member.summary: This member is no longer used and is always set to zero.
